TopicTitle: Lunar Mission - Lander game for IOS & Android

Articles.Content:
Hello there,

I've created a little game for IOS & Android, and thought you might be interrested as it's a particular game..

Its a lander game inspired by the old classic Lunar Lander.

The game is pretty simple: take off, fly & land carrefully to get your final result.

Simple but challenging because of the physics and the inertia. 

There is a nice little atmosphere and new events appear along the levels to bring more diversity.

![lunar_01.gif](http://www.puppet-box.com/images/lunar_01.gif)

![lunar_02.gif](http://www.puppet-box.com/images/lunar_02.gif)

![lunar_03.gif](http://www.puppet-box.com/images/lunar_03.gif)

The game is free, you can download it here:

Google Play:

[https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.puppetbox.lunarmission](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.puppetbox.lunarmission)

App store:

[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lunar-mission/id969863507?l=fr&ls=1&mt=8](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lunar-mission/id969863507?l=fr&ls=1&mt=8)

Hope you will like it ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Judging by the preview images it looks nice, but I'm not installing anything that requires this amount of private data.

![Screenshot_2015_03_18_03_48_04.png](http://s15.postimg.org/7cgcy0fq3/Screenshot_2015_03_18_03_48_04.png)

Why on earth do application developers require these things is beyond my understanding. I never install such things. I could understand the need to reveal crude location data (country, city) for statistical purposes, but device ID and call information? My photos? Some applications even require device and application history. Gestapo would be proud.

If you remove these, I will gladly test it. Until then, no way is this entering my phone.

Aw there is nothing I can do about this :/ , it's from the html5 Wrapper I'm using (cocoonjs), they know about the permissions problem, but they still havent fixed it yet....

But I can assure you that my game absolutely wont use any of these, it's like some ghostly permissions that remain because I couldnt remove them.
